text: José Manuel Piñeiro Amigo (27 May 1938 – 1 June 2021) was a Spanish politician and lawyer. He worked at the Congress of Deputies from 1977 until 1982.Muere José Manuel Piñeiro Amigo, diputado en la legislatura constituyente y exsecretario de Fegamp He was born in Cambados, Spain. Piñeiro Amigo died on 1 June 2021, aged 83. ==References== Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish lawyers Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths
title: José Manuel Piñeiro Amigo
